name: 霍弘毅
objective:
本課程著重教導學生閱讀文章，並藉由文章訓練學生字彙建構、語言解析及聽力會話、思維啟發能力。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。

This course will be divided into two parts: Grammar/Writing and Reading/Comprehension/Vocabulary. A portion of your grade will come from the NTUT Mid-Term and Final Exams, and a portion will come from Dr. Wall’s Mid-Term and Final Exams. Generally we will learn and apply Grammar to Writing during the one-hour class and Reading/Comprehension/Vocabulary during the two hour class. During class Dr. Wall will stress what vocabulary words to remember. Both Dr. Wall Exams will be open book.
scorePolicy:
NTUT Mid-Term 15%
NTUT Final 15%
Dr. Wall Mid-Term 30%
Dr. Wall Final 40%

Extra credit can be gotten by participating in the English Plus program activities (see our webpage for details)
materials:
Dr. Wall’s Guide to Formal Grammar [Handout]
Chapters from Taipei Tech Design and Arts and Humanities Readers [Handouts]
